UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Bioactivity of Natural and Engineered Antimicrobial Peptides from Venom of the Scorpions Urodacus yaschenkoi and U. manicatus.
Literature.Author: Luna-Ramírez K, Tonk M, Rahnamaeian M, Vilcinskas A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Baby Hamster Kidney cells BHK-21:EC50=18.58 µM,Pig erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=15.50 µM,Pig erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=48 µM,Pig erythrocytes:90% Hemolysis=148.51 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus DSM 20030(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli D31(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM 50071(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus DSM 2569(no activity data),Listeria grayi DSM 20601(MIC=8µM),Listeria fleischmannii DSM 24998(MIC=4µM),Listeria monocytogenes DSM 20600(MIC=4µM),Fusarium culmorum(no activity data),Fusarium graminearum 8/1(no activity data)
